unit.name: Black Orc Waaaghboss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Quell Animosity, Size (4), Orc.

unit.name: Orc Waaaghboss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Waaaghboss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa. Special Rules: Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblin Waaaghboss
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblin Waaaghboss
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Orc Great Shaman
unit.description: Magic: An Orc Great Shaman is a L4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Great Shaman
unit.description: Magic: An Orc Great Shaman is a L4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblin Great Shaman
unit.description: Magic: A Goblin Great Shaman is a L4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblin Great Shaman
unit.description: Magic: A Goblin Great Shaman is a L4 wizard.Equipment: Hand weapon and D3 Magic Mushrooms. Special Rules: Magic Mushrooms, Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Black Orc BSB
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Quell Animosity, Size (4), Orc.

unit.name: Orc BSB
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc BSB
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa. Special Rules: Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblin BSB
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblin BSB
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Black Orc Big Boss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Quell Animosity, Size (4), Orc.

unit.name: Orc Big Boss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and heavy armour. Special Rules: Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Big Boss
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa. Special Rules: Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblin Big Boss
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Light armour. Special Rules: Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblin Big Boss
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Light armour. Special Rules: Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Orc Shaman
unit.description: Magic: An Orc Shaman is a L2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Shaman
unit.description: Magic: An Orc Shaman is a L2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblin Shaman
unit.description: Magic: A Goblin Shaman is a L2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblin Shaman
unit.description: Magic: A Goblin Shaman is a L2 wizard.Equipment: Hand weapon and 1 Magic Mushroom. Special Rules: Magic Mushrooms, Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Orc Boyz
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Anti-Cav (spear), Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Orc Arrer Boyz
unit.description: Equipment: Bow and light armour. Special Rules: Animosity, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Snotling Swarm
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Unbreakable (Swarm), Small, Size (1).

unit.name: Savage Orc Boyz
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Arrer Boyz
unit.description: Equipment: Bow. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Animosity, Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Goblins
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Size (2). Nasty Skulkers: Equipment: Additional hand weapon. Special Rules: Nasty Skulker, Killing Blow, AP (1), Dodge (6+).

unit.name: Night Goblins
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Night Goblins (Loony Host)
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Hatred (Dwarfs), Size (2).

unit.name: Goblin Wolf Rider
unit.description: Mount: Wolf. Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Animosity, Light Cavalry, Size (2).

unit.name: Goblin Spider Rider
unit.description: Mount: Giant Spider. Equipment: Spear and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Light Cav, Poisoned Attacks (1) (Spiders only),ignores difficult terrain, Size (2).

unit.name: Orc Big Uns
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Anti-Cav (spear), Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Big Uns
unit.description: Equipment: Choppa and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Frenzy, Warpaint, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Black Orcs
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon, Choppa, additional Choppa, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Quell Animosity, Size (4), Orc.

unit.name: Squig Herd
unit.description: Equipment: Spear (Squig Herders only). Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Squigs, Size (2), Hatred (Dwarfs) (Squig Herder only).

unit.name: Squig Hopper
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Skirmish, Squig Hoppers, Size (2)

unit.name: Orc Boar Boyz
unit.description: Mount: Boar. Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Animosity, Thick-skinned, Tusker Charge, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Savage Orc Boar Boyz
unit.description: Mount: Boar. Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Animosity, Thick-skinned, Frenzy, Warpaint, Tusker Charge, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Wolf Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 3 Goblin Crew, 2 Wolves. Equipment: The crew is armed with handweapons and short bows. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Size (2).

unit.name: Boar Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Orc Crew, 2 Boars. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Tusker Charge, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Boar Chariot (Savage Orcs)
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Savage Orc Crew, 2 Boars. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears. Special Rules: Frenzy (Savage Orc crew only), Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Tusker Charge, Size (3), Orc.

unit.name: Spear Chukka
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Goblin Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Bolt Thrower, Size (2).

unit.name: Rock Lobber
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Goblin Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Rock Lobber, Size (2).

unit.name: Giant
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Stubborn, Large Target,Immune to psychology, Giant, Size (5).

unit.name: Troll
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Stupidity, Regeneration (4+), Troll Vomit, Size (4).

unit.name: River Troll
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: River Troll Skin, Fear, Stupidity, Regeneration (4+), Troll Vomit, Size (4).

unit.name: Stone Troll
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: MR (2), Scaly Skin (6+), Fear, Stupidity, Regeneration (4+), Troll Vomit, Size (4).

unit.name: Pump Wagon
unit.description: Chariot: 6+AS, 1 Snotling Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Unbreakable, Pump Wagon, Impact Hits (2D6), Size (1).

unit.name: Doom Diver
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Goblin Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Doom Diver, Size (2).

unit.name: Mangler Squigs
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Mangler Squigs, Size (4).

unit.name: Arachnarok Spider
unit.description: Monster: Arachnarok Spider and 8 Goblin Crew. Equipment: Goblin Crew is armed with short bows and one Flinger. Special Rules: Large Target, Scaly Skin (4+), Immue to Psychology, Terror, Poisoned Attacks (1),ignores difficult terrain, Size (5).

mount.name: Giant Spider
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), Spider Walk.

mount.name: Boar
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Thick-skinned, Tusker Charge.

mount.name: Gigantic Spider
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), ignores difficult terrain.

mount.name: Great Cave Squig
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Immune to Psychology, Great Cave Squig.

mount.name: Wyvern
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Poisoned Attacks (1), Scaly Skin (4+).

mount.name: Boar Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Orc Crew, 2 Boars. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Tusker Charge, Size (3).

mount.name: Boar Chariot (Savage Orcs)
mount.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 Savage Orc Crew, 2 Boars. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears. Special Rules: Frenzy, Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Tusker Charge, Size (3).

mount.name: Wolf Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 3 Goblin Crew, 2 Wolves. Equipment: The crew is armed with spears and short bows. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Ramshackle, Size (2).

item.name: Aargs Ard Armour
item.description: 2+AS, Models on foot only.

item.name: Additional Choppa
Unit: Additional Choppas
item.description: Models on foot gain AP (1) in each first round of combat. S like wielder, +1A, Two-handed.

item.name: Amulett of Protectyness
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Animosity
item.description: In your Start of the Turn phase roll a D6 if the unit has a US of at least 5 and if it is not engaged in combat or broken. On a roll of a 1 the unit suffers from animosity. Roll a D6 and consult the animosity table to determine the effect.

item.name: Armour of Gork
item.description: Heavy armour, +1T

item.name: Armour of Mork
item.description: Heavy armour, MR(2)

item.name: BM Brain Bursta
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Eadbutt
item.description: (7+) Range 24", single enemy model within LOS suffers a S4 hit with no AS. Models may only be hit once per magic phase by an Eadbutt, i.e. subsequent hits are ignored.

item.name: BM Ere We Go
item.description: (9+) Augment, Range 18", target unit in cc immediately fights one round of combat. Charge bonuses do not apply. Enemy units cannot fight back and there is no combat resolution. Each unit may only benefit from this spell once per magic phase.

item.name: BM Fists of Gork
item.description: (10+) Direct Damage, Range 24", place the center of the 5" template within 24", for each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S4 AP(1) hit, allocated like shooting.

item.name: BM Foot of Gork
item.description: (13+) Direct Damage, Range 48", place the center of the 3" template within 48", for each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S6 hit, allocated like shooting.

item.name: BM Gaze of Gork
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Gaze of Mork
item.description: (6+) MM, Range 24", D6 S3 hits, no AS

item.name: BM Gork ll fix it
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 24", Target unit suffers -1 to to-hit rolls and -1 to to-wound rolls as well as -1AS until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Hand of Gork
item.description: (10+) Augment, Range 24". Choose a point within line of sight of the target unit. The unit then moves 2D6" in the direction of that point (use the shortest path; the unit has to wheel and does not stop when it reaches the point, i.e. it continues to move straight forward). The unit is affected by terrain as normal. If it comes into contact with a unit or impassable terrain the unit stops 1" in front of it. - In addition the unit gets +2M until the casters next magic phase. - Each unit may only benefit from this spell once per magic phase.

item.name: Backstabbers Blade
item.description: The model gains +1A when fighting in the flank and +2A for fighting in the rear of a unit.

item.name: Bad Moon Banner
item.description: Bearer and his unit gain Stubborn.

item.name: Bashas Bloodaxe
item.description: Choppa and Frenzy. +D6 A instead of +1 A for Frenzy. The bearer is forced to use this weapon, can never lose Frenzy and cannot join units. Models on foot only.

item.name: Battleaxe of the Last Waaagh!
Battleaxe of Last Waaagh
item.description: At the start of each combat phase roll a D6. Until the end of the combat phase the model gains: 1-2: +3A and +1S; 3-4: +2A and +2S, 5-6: +1A and +3S.

item.name: Big Stabba
item.description: The unit is armed with a Big Stabba. If the unit has at least 1 rank of 5 models behind the first rank, then it deals 1 S5 Impact Hit that causes D3 wounds vs Large Targets. Bolt Thrower: Range 48", S6, D3 wounds, no AS, penetrates ranks

item.name: Biggeds Kickin Boots
item.description: +1A at bearers base strength, counts as a magical attack but no other special rules of the model apply

item.name: Borkz Standard
item.description: Unit ignores first failed Animosity test in the game. One use only.

item.name: Bountiful Blades
item.description: This unit is equipped with an array of weaponry. At the start of each combat it has to choose one of the following weapon options: great weapon, additional hand weapon or hand weapon and shield.

item.name: Buzzgobs Knobby Crook
item.description: Once per magic phase the bearer may reroll all(!) dice used to cast a spell (BM and PM). Can be used even if first roll was successful but cannot prevent miscasts, i.e. if the first result is a miscast you cannot use the reroll. A reroll can cause irresistible force.

item.name: Catchweb Spidershrine
item.description: Friendly Wizards within 12" of the model gain +1 to their casting rolls (BM and PM).

item.name: Choppa
item.description: Models on foot gain AP (1) in each first round of combat.

item.name: Collar of Zorga
item.description: Mounts and Monsters hit the bearer only on to-hit rolls of 6s.

item.name: Crown of Command
item.description: The model may boost its Ld to 10 for one Ld-test (incl. a potential reroll). Declare its use before you roll for the test. Can be used by the general to benefit a unit within 12". One use only.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Doom Diver
item.description: Catapult, Range 12"-48". The Doom Diver does not use a template, instead the unit under the point of impact suffers D6 S5 AP(1) hits. Also, the Goblin Player may move the point of impact up to D3" towards the original target point.

item.name: Effigy of Mork
item.description: bearer is at -1 to hit in cc

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Fanatic
item.description: Special Rules: Immune to Psychology. - Hide in Units: Fanatics start the game hidden in the respective Night Goblin unit they are bought with, the so-called Host. Release the Fanatics!: Fanatics must be immediately released when an enemy unit comes within 8" of the Host. Stop the enemy unit, then for each Fanatic hiding in the unit, nominate a point of release on any edge of the Host as well as a direction and roll dice for the Fanatics movement (2D6"). Once the movement of all released Fanatics and the damage they caused has been resolved, the enemy unit can continue its move if the controlling player wishes to do so. Fanatics are not released if the Host is broken. - Splat!: If a Fanatic moves into contact with a unit it inflicts D6 S5 AP(1) hits and continues to move straight through the unit. If the Fanatic would end its movement inside a unit, it continues to move straight ahead until it can end its move outside of a unit or until it is destroyed. Force of Destruction: Fanatics cannot be charged but models can move and charge through them. Any unit moving though a Fanatic takes D6 S5 AP(1) hits. Units that end their movement on a Fanatic suffer an additional D3 S5 AP(1) hits and the Fanatic is removed as a casualty. Fanatics can be targeted with spells and shooting attacks and count as single models/skirmishers. Unit that shoot at Fanatics may split their fire to target multiple Fanatics. - Out of Control: Instead of moving normally, Fanatics move randomly in compulsory movement phase (only in the turn of the O&G player). Completely resolve one Fanatic before you move to the next, in an order of your choice. Each Fanatic moves 2D6" in a straight line in a direction determined by a scatter dice. - A Fanatic is removed immediately as casualty when: - it gets in contact with the table edge or a terrain piece other than a hill - it gets in contact with another Fanatic - it rolls a double for movement (only after the turn of release). - Miscellaneous: - Fanatics cause D6 S5 AP(1) hits to any unit they contact. Hits are treated as close combat hits and are distributed like shooting. - Casualties caused by Fanatics do not cause panic tests. - Fanatics cannot be released voluntarily. - Victory points are determined by the Host, i.e. individual Fanatics are not worth any victory points themselves.

item.name: Flinger
item.description: Catapult, Range 12-48", S2(2), 5" Template, no stand and shoot. Any unit that suffers at least one hit suffers a penalty of -1 WS and -1 I until the end of the Flingers next turn. The model may move and shoot but the crew is only allowed to use its BS when the model stayed stationary. Misfire: weapon does not fire and the model suffers one wound (no saves allowed).

item.name: Goblin Horde
item.description: If the army does not include any Orcs (of any kind), it may include 0-2 Lord level characters.

item.name: Gorks Waaagh Banner
item.description: Unit gains +1M.

item.name: Great Cave Squig
item.description: Random Movement (3) with the following exceptions: The model has a AOS of 360deg, i.e. it can move in all directions. It ignores difficult terrain during movement. If the character riding the GC Squig is killed, then the GC Squig is treated like out of control Mangler Squigs (see below) with the exception that it only causes 3 S5 hits to units it moves through and 1 S5 hit to units it is charged by.

item.name: Green Glowing Amulet
item.description: If the bearer or the unit he joined is the target of a spell you can decide to try to absorb the spell instead of trying to dispel it. If you do so, roll a number of dice equal to the number of dice used to cast the spell. If all dice show a 2+ then the spell counts as dispelled. If one or more 1s show up then the spell got through and in addition the bearer is killed (with no saves of any kind) and removed as a casualty. The item cannot be used against spells that were cast with irresistible force.

item.name: Grottz Rebels Banner
item.description: All Goblins in the unit (including characters) gain +1Ld.

item.name: Guffz Flag
item.description: Unit rerolls its first failed panic test in the game. One use only.

item.name: Guzzlas Backbone Brew
item.description: At the start of the game check which effect the brew has on the bearer: 1-2 Stupidity, 3-4 Hatred, 5-6: Hatred and Frenzy

item.name: Idol of Mork
item.description: +1 PD for each (own) Orc unit (of any kind) of 20+ models in cc within 24". PD generated in this way can only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Imbads Iron Gnashas
item.description: Killing Blow

item.name: Iron Skin Shield
item.description: Shield, bearer rerolls failed armour saves

item.name: Ironback Boar
item.description: The model inflicts D3 Impact Hits at S5. Only for models mounted on a boar.

item.name: Maads Map
item.description: Bearer gains the Scout special rule. Models on foot only.

item.name: Madcap Mushrooms
item.description: You may reroll the number of hits caused by each Fanatic when Fanatics are released from the unit joined by the bearer. One use only.

item.name: Magic Mushrooms
item.description: The model starts the game with X Magic Mushrooms (MM). Before casting a spell, the model may choose to use any number of MMs it has left to boost its next spell (may exceed limit of dice used). Each MM is used exactly like a PD except that for each roll of a 1 the model loses a wound with no saves (of any kind) allowed. If the model is killed because of a MM and the spell is successfully cast, then the spell still goes off. Also, dice generated by MMs can never be rerolled. One use only per MM.

item.name: Mangler Squigs
item.description: Random Movement (3) with the following exceptions: The model has an AOS of 360deg, i.e. it can move in all directions. It ignores difficult terrain during movement. It moves through units instead of stopping upon contact. If its move would end on a unit, continue to move the model in the same direction until it ends its move 1" behind a unit. Once it moved through its first unit, the model gets out of control and from then on moves in random directions, i.e. the direction it moves in is determined by a scatter dice every time it moves. When the Mangler Squigs are out of control and any doubles (or triples) are rolled for movement, then the Mangler Squigs collapse at the end of their move and the model is removed as a casualty. Any unit the model moved through suffers 1D6+3 S5 hits. If the enemy completes a charge on the model, the charging unit immediately suffers 1D6 S5 hits and the Mangler Squigs are destroyed. There is no close combat and no overrun movement is allowed.

item.name: Morks Spirit Totem
item.description: MR (2), enemy magic items of models that are in btb with the bearer do not work.

item.name: Nasty Skulker
item.description: Nasty Skulkers start the game concealed in their unit. The Goblin player may reveal any Nasty Skulkers at the start of any of his turns or at the start of any combat phase. When a Nasty Skulker is revealed place it in btb with the enemy (cc) or in the front rank of the unit (when the unit is not in cc). If possible, a rank and file model of the unit is placed in the back of the unit to make space, if not a character model may be moved. A Nasty Skulker that is revealed at the start of the combat phase gains ASF until the end of the turn. Nasty Skulkers are treated exactly like unit Champions. Concealed Nasty Skulkers cannot be damaged in any kind of way.

item.name: Netters
item.description: At the start of each combat phase a unit that includes Netters may throw nets at one unit in btb. Roll a D6 to determine the effect. 1: the unit with netters suffer a -1S penalty until the end of turn. 2+: the targeted unit suffer a -1S penalty until the end of turn. This penalty is not cumulative.

item.name: Nibblas Itty Ring
item.description: PM1/3+, Eadbutt spell, if you roll a natural 1 to cast then the bearer suffers a S5 hit.

item.name: Noggs Banner of Butchery
item.description: All Greenskins in the unit that are in btb with an enemy model gain +1A. Has no effect on mounts. Declare use at the start of any close combat phase. One use only.

item.name: PM Bash em Ladz 2/5+
PM Bash em Ladz 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s in cc until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Gorks Chosen 2/5+
PM Gorks Chosen 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", target character model gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Guidance of Mork 2/3+
PM Guidance of Mork 3/3+
item.description: Augment, all units within 6" automatically pass their next Animosity test

item.name: Porkkoz Pointy Stick
item.description: Counts as a spear. During a charge the bearer gains +1A for each rank that grants a rank bonus of the charged unit. Mounted models only.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Quell Animosity
item.description: Units within 6" of this unit/model reroll failed Animosity tests. This special rule cannot be used if this unit/model is broken.

item.name: River Troll Skin
item.description: An enemy attacking this unit in cc, suffers a -1 to hit penalty.

item.name: Rock Lobber
item.description: Catapult, Range 12"-60", 3" Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds.

item.name: Shagas Screamin Sword
item.description: +1A and +1S, for every enemy character within 12"

item.name: Shields (loses Light Cavalry)
item.description: +1AS

item.name: Size Matters
item.description: All Greenskins have a Size (X). Greenskins ignore panic caused by units with a Size value that is lower than their own.

item.name: Smelly Elves
item.description: All Goblins Fear Elves (any kind) if they do not outnumber them 2:1 or more. Compare the number of Goblin heads vs number of Elf heads, not US.

item.name: Sneaky Skewerer
item.description: AP (3)

item.name: Snoggas Squigbeata
item.description: +3A until the end of the turn. Declare at the start of the combat phase. One use only, afterwards the weapon counts as a magic hand weapon.

item.name: Spider Banner
item.description: Models in the unit gain Poisoned Attacks (1) in cc only. If models in the unit already have Poisoned Attacks then the Poisoned Attacks value is increased by 1 for them. Has no effect on magic weapons.

item.name: Spider Walk
item.description: The model ignores difficult terrain during movement

item.name: Spiteful Shield
item.description: Shield, models that roll a natural 1 to hit against the bearer suffer a S5 hit.

item.name: Squig Hoppers
item.description: Random Movement (3) with the following exceptions: As Skirmishers the unit has a AOS of 360deg, i.e. it can move in all directions, and it ignores difficult terrain during movement. To move the unit pick one of its models and a direction, then roll for the units movement distance and move the model the determined distance in this direction. Afterwards move all remaining models of the unit completely within 3" of the first model but no further than the first model, i.e. models can only be positioned left, right or behind the model but not in front of it (see diagram below). Models that cannot be placed without getting in contact with the board edge, impassable terrain or within 1" of a unit are destroyed. If the first model gets into contact with an enemy unit and the enemy unit takes the charge, then all Squigs of the unit have to be positioned in btb with the enemy unit if possible (but only in the side facing the Squigs, i.e. there is no lapping around!), independent of the actual move distance of each model.

item.name: Squigs
item.description: The unit consists of Squigs and Squig Herders. Fill ranks with Squigs first then with Squig Herders. Randomise ranged hits between Squigs (1-5) and Squig Herders (6). If there are more than 3 Squigs per Herder at any time or the unit breaks from combat then the unit explodes. When the unit explodes it deals 1 S5 hit for each full 3 Squigs left to each unit (friend or foe) within 6" and is then removed as a casualty.

item.name: Staff of Badduumm
item.description: +1 to cast (BM and PM)

item.name: Staff of Sneaky Stealin
item.description: In the opponents magic phase you may take one of your opponents PD and add it to your DD pool.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Talismanic Warpaint
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR(1)

item.name: Thick-skinned
item.description: Mount grants +2AS instead of +1AS

item.name: Toothy Tassels
item.description: Once per game the bearer may modify one dice used to cast a spell (BM and PM) by +1. Can prevent miscasts and cause irresistible force. One use only.

item.name: Triksy Trinket
item.description: Models in btb with the bearer (friend or foe) lose their Ward Save (as long as they are in btb).

item.name: Troll Eye Necklace
item.description: Regeneration (4+)

item.name: Troll Vomit
item.description: Instead of attacking normally, the unit may decide to use their special vomit attack: each model causes 1 S5 hit with no AS to one enemy model it is in btb with.
